item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Kagi Teams (144 points | 69 comments)
2. Show HN: Hacker Herald – like HN but with crowdsourced pics and subtitles (65 points | 19 comments)
3. The correct amount of ads is zero (666 points | 413 comments)
4. Trailbase: Fast, single-file, open-source app server built using Rust and SQLite (225 points | 75 comments)
5. Show HN: Prompt Engine – Auto pick LLMs based on your prompts (7 points | discuss)
6. ChatGPT Pro (726 points | 1042 comments)
7. Portland airport grows with expansive mass timber roof canopy (288 points | 174 comments)
8. Can a Comma Solve a Crime? (8 points | 3 comments)
9. Ukraine's three nuclear power plants have restored electricity production (188 points | 167 comments)
10. RankScience (YC W17) is hiring to supercharge SEO for startups ( | hide)
11. The 70% problem: Hard truths about AI-assisted coding (342 points | 281 comments)
12. Gitlab names Bill Staples as new CEO (220 points | 199 comments)

24. Show HN: Banan-OS, an Unix-like operating system written from scratch (287 points | 39 comments)
25. The Problem with Sci-Fi Body Armor (65 points | 16 comments)
26. I spent a year building an Android course for the elderly (167 points | 70 comments)
27. A transport protocol's view of Starlink (121 points | 23 comments)
28. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (120 points | 27 comments)
29. Litdb – type safe SQL for JavaScript/TS (91 points | 56 comments)
30. Researchers get 'compact' hard X-ray machine to work (109 points | 25 comments)
